company.name: University of Texas Libraries
company.title: Software Developer
responsibilities: Write, test & debug programming for UTL systems.
Provide operational & customer support for UTL services.
Monitoring systems, providing customer service, issue investigation, and documentation.
Planning & monitoring of project tasks, communicating project status to stakeholders to ensure deadlines are met.
Contribute to application quality through participation in validation, testing, and documentation of product releases.

company.name: University of Texas at Austin + Purchasing Office
company.title: Procurement Card Administrator
responsibilities: Manage card usage & policy for approx. 1400+ cards & users.
Create & maintain consistent, secure & effective processes for users
Construct & analyze reports to calibrate operations by verifying usage is in alignment with purchasing policy & users' expectations.

company.name: Pirkey Barber PLLC
company.title: Facilities Coordinator + Chief Problem Solver
responsibilities: Maintained a professional office of 30+ employees.
Manage digital & physical documentation in multiple locations.
General office duties: reception work, receiving goods, placing orders, facilitating events, mail processing, and hardware maintenance.
